page.title: 05THE NEW TRADING EST-MILLSHAW
page.content: About five years ago,a new industrial estate was built on existing farmland at Millshaw,south of Cottingley.This site is on the edge of Leeds and gives easy access to the M62. Several firms established themselves, employing small work forces,on average twenty.There is a variety of products including window blinds,clothes lining ,fruit machines,oil filters and confectionary.Apart from a Swedish Company, they are all British,dist- ributing products. Our survey showed that half the comp- anies have an export trade.All but one has an increased work force,and for the majority,trade is very good at the present time.Several have new ideas for the future,including opening fact- ories abroad.
